Strings.Text: The machine has been damaged \nby the large dinosaur intrusion.{pause}{clear}It can't be operated.{pause}

You have ten minutes to disarm 
the emergency interception mode {pause}{clear}of the missile warhead. The key 
to beating the giant dinosaur is {pause}{clear}to use the flammable gas 
energy injection terminal on the {pause}{clear}walk way.{pause}
